ModMetaData.name: Hydroponics Extended
ModMetaData.author: elStrages
ModMetaData.description:
Hydroponics Extended is a mod to improve farming lat game. Mod was made for my use, however if it picks up traction i will endeavour to improve it. ---------------------------------------- Version: V1.40 Change Log ---------------------------------------- - Updated to 1.4 - Log number increased to reflect rimworld only
---------------------------------------- Version: V1.00 Change Log ---------------------------------------- - 2 Tiers of aditional Hydroponics Basin. - Devilstrand and bamboo can be grown in hydroponics.
